text: Asdrubal Mendes Bentes (July 27, 1939 – April 27, 2020) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer from the state of Pará. ==Life== He represented Pará in the national Chamber of Deputies, the lower house of the National Congress of Brazil, for several tenures beginning in 1987. Most recently, he served in the Chamber of Deputies for four consecutive terms from February 1, 2001, to March 26, 2014. He was also a former president of the Paysandu Sport Club, a Brazilian football team based in Belém. ==Death== Bentes was hospitalized in a Belém intensive care unit for coronavirus on April 23, 2020. He died from complications of COVID-19 at the Hospital Aberlardo Santos in the Icoaraci district of Belém on April 27, 2020, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Brazil) from Pará Category:Association football executives Category:Brazilian sports executives and administrators Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:People from Humaitá, Amazonas Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Pará
